name: Education Programs System
description: The term education system generally refers to public schooling, not private schooling, and more commonly to kindergarten through high school programs. Schools or school districts are typically the smallest recognized form of “education system” and countries are the largest.

name: MIDDLE SCHOOLERS COMMIT TO KNOWLEDGE
description: Knowledge, truth and honor are at the core of Lausanne's Middle School, a fact highlighted in the KTH Code. Our Middle School students.

name: Guitar Classes
description: Guitar (Acoustic/Electric) lessons for beginners focus on finger placement, strumming, sight-reading, understanding groove and chord placement. Students will learn to care for their instrument as well as tuning the guitar. From classic rock to current music, guitar lessons are sure to excite your child.

name: LAUSANNE DEFEATS ECS TO REMAIN UNDEFEATED

name: School tour
description: f you’ve been considering to plan to an educational tour for kids, you’ve come to the right place to get more information. You might wonder if an educational tour is just a marketing tactic, or if it actually proves to be beneficial for kids.
